content: siddeunderlag strikket i ren uld og filtet i maskine på 60 gr giver et rigtigt lækkert siddeunderlag denne opskrift er så enkel at det er et rigtig godt begynderprojekt for både børn og uerfarne strikkere underlaget strikkes på 2 pinde eller lille rundpind str 5 5 mm siddeunderlaget strikkes som et firkantet stykke med et håndtag i toppen en god gaveide til dem der ikke synes om kolde stolesæder - og her kan du få brugt alle dine uldgarn rester og skabe dit eget personlige design håber alle som laver siddeunderlag vil uploade deres projekt her på ravelry så vi kan inspirere hinanden ¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤ the seating pad is made of pure wool and felted after knitting by machinewash at 60 dgr this pattern is so simple and really a good beginners projekt for children youngsters and unexperienced knitters the seating pad is knitted as a square where doublepins size 5 5 are used or a small circular needle you will learn how to knit a hole used as handle for the seating pad the seating pad is the perfect gift for those struggling with cold seatings - at home or in the stadium you can design your own seating pad i usually use all my pure wool scrapyarn and mix all the colours a good small projekt to bring with you when you re on the go my hope is that all who knit this seating pad will upload their personal design on this ravelry page så we can inspire and learn from each other
